description:
Prontologic is a team of innovators that work with clients to discover in-depth consumer insights, develop a strategic marketing plan, and deliver creative solutions driven by analytics and explicit logic.
WE’RE AGILE. 
We use data and analytics to test solutions to big problems, evaluate results, learn, and test again. Traditional marketing firms don’t have technology partners that can move quickly enough. Prontologic can replace the role of both an agency and marketing consultancy by making results-orientated decisions while striving to build properly tested product increments within short iterations.
